definition[0]: a room or building where tools and machines are used for making or repairing things
definition[1]: a meeting at which people try to improve their skills by discussing their experiences and doing practical exercises
example[0]: They held a number of music workshops and seminars.
definition[2]: a fairly small room or building in which tools and machines are used for making or repairing things
example[1]: Many local crafts people produce their goods from small workshops in their homes.
definition[3]: a meeting at which people discuss their experiences and do practical exercises, especially in order to find solutions to problems
example[2]: Staff attended a two-day training workshop on basic PR techniques.
